snippet.title: Hydefos (MSX2)
snippet.description: Shmup by Hertz from 1989, and one of the few games that proves that the MSX2 is actually capable of smooth scrolling. The video shows the first stage, and was recorded using the built-in capture option from the emulator BlueMSX.
